name: Toni Ulmen
introduction: Anton "Toni" Ulmen (born 25 January 1906 and died 4 November 1976) was a German motorcycle and racing driver who raced in numerous Formula 2, sports cars and motorcycle events during the late 1940s. In 1952 he participated in the Swiss and German Grands Prix in a privateered Veritas. He scored no championship points in his career.
